name: device_turnOff
description: This function is used to turn off a smart home appliance or device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device which needs to be turned off is located. e.g. Home, house, office, etc.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located. e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to be turned off.
